data.trans_hint: Con trai anh trông không giống anh chút nào cả.
data.en_hint: Your son doesn't take after you at all.
data.content_game_1: Your son doesn't take after you at all.
data.answer_en_hint: Your son doesn't take after you at all.

data.trans_hint: Nếu bạn nghe lời anh ấy thì bây giờ bạn đang sắp gặp phải rắc rối to rồi.
data.en_hint: If you had listened to him, you would be heading for troubles now.
data.content_game_1: If you had listened to him, you would be heading for troubles now.
data.answer_en_hint: If you had listened to him, you would be heading for troubles now.

data.trans_hint: Ngay khi anh ấy bắt đầu chiến dịch của anh ta, anh ấy đã trở thành tâm điểm của công chúng.
data.en_hint: Right when he started his campaign, he was to the fore of the public.
data.content_game_1: Right when he started his campaign, he was to the fore of the public.
data.answer_en_hint: Right when he started his campaign, he was to the fore of the public.

data.trans_hint: Vụ bê bối của bộ trưởng chắc chắn sẽ được lên trang nhất ngày mai.
data.en_hint: The scandal of the minister would surely grab the headlines tomorrow.
data.content_game_1: The scandal of the minister would surely grab the headlines tomorrow.

data.trans: Không chấp nhận điều gì đó
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy không thể chấp nhận được những bất công mà phụ nữ phải gánh chịu. Đó là lý do tại sao cô ấy đã trở thành một chính trị gia.
data.en_hint: She couldn't stand for the injustice women have to suffer. That was why she became a politician.
data.content_game_1: She couldn't stand for the injustice women have to suffer. That was why she became a politician.

data.trans: Bắt đầu sự nghiệp với tư cách là
data.trans_hint: Anh ta đã bắt đầu sự nghiệp là một diễn viên hài, nhưng sau đó cuộc đời lại biến anh ta thành một vị tổng thống.
data.en_hint: He set out to be a comedian, but then life made him a president.
data.content_game_1: He set out to be a comedian, but then life made him a president.
data.answer_en_hint: He set out to be a comedian, but then life made him a president.

data.trans: Chiến thắng một cách dễ dàng
data.trans_hint: Jack đã không cần phải làm gì nhiều để thắng cả. Bố anh ta đã lo liệu ngay từ đầu rồi.
data.en_hint: Jack didn't need to do a lot of sweep to victory. His dad was pulling strings all along.
data.content_game_1: Jack didn't need to do a lot of sweep to victory. His dad was pulling strings all along.
data.answer_en_hint: Jack didn't need to do a lot of sweep to victory. His dad was pulling strings all along.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta có một cuộc sống xán lạn ở phía trước nếu tiếp quản công ty gia đình, nhưng anh ta đã quay lưng lại với nó và trở thành thợ làm tóc.
data.en_hint: He would have a promising life ahead if taking over the family business, but he just turned his back on it and became a hairdresser.
data.content_game_1: He would have a promising life ahead if taking over the family business, but he just turned his back on it and became a hairdresser.
data.answer_en_hint: He would have a promising life ahead if taking over the family business, but he just turned his back on it and became a hairdresser.

data.trans_hint: Được ưu ái bởi Jack, bạn sẽ dễ dàng có được chiến thắng trong cuộc bầu cử tới.
data.en_hint: Being under Jack's wing, you will soon sweep to victory in the next election.
